module.name: physical_unit_design_view
module.keywords: module, part, design, assembly, component, physical, thermal, connection zone

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of information needed to describe a specifically designed item in sufficient detail to permit production of that item in a manufacturing process and to permit analysis of that item's response to a simulated environment in a computer based experimental environment. Representation of part occurrence with or without specified function is also supported.

inscope.li: describtion of a specifically designed item in sufficient detail to permit production of that item in a manufacturing process;
describtion of a specifically designed item in sufficient detail to permit analysis of that item's response to a simulated environment in a computer based experimental environment;
identification of an occurrence of a part in an assembly;
identification of an occurrence of a part in an assembly, that is also an occurrence of a function;
identification of an association between part occurrences in part usage and design view;
items within the scope of application module Component grouping, ISO/TS 10303-1656;
items within the scope of application module Physical layout template, ISO/TS 10303-1722;
items within the scope of application module Physical unit usage view, ISO/TS 10303-1732.

outscope.li: identification of a usage of a part in an assembly.

definition.def: occurrence of a product used in an assembled product
